name: @revenium/openai
description: Transparent TypeScript middleware for automatic Revenium usage tracking with OpenAI

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.example:getting-started: npm run build && npx tsx examples/getting_started.ts
scripts.example:openai-basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/openai/basic.ts
scripts.example:openai-metadata: npm run build && npx tsx examples/openai/metadata.ts
scripts.example:openai-stream: npm run build && npx tsx examples/openai/streaming.ts
scripts.example:openai-res-basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/openai/responses-basic.ts
scripts.example:openai-res-embed: npm run build && npx tsx examples/openai/responses-embed.ts
scripts.example:openai-res-stream: npm run build && npx tsx examples/openai/responses-streaming.ts
scripts.example:azure-basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/azure/basic.ts
scripts.example:azure-stream: npm run build && npx tsx examples/azure/stream.ts
scripts.example:azure-res-basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/azure/responses-basic.ts
scripts.example:azure-res-stream: npm run build && npx tsx examples/azure/responses-stream.ts

author: Revenium
